story_teamaquamagma_02_02000/2401_1001_0:
From what Zinnia was saying, the meteor should
have fallen around here somewhere...
Do you see something over there?
We don’t want to fight you!
Agh! We won’t last if we’re only defending...
We have no choice. Let’s do this, Rayquaza!
story_teamaquamagma_02_02000/2401_1001_1:
Deoxys seemed like it was after Rayquaza...
I wonder why.

Steven, we’re in trouble! It turns out what I was
concerned about might really happen!
When I called my contact, they were so surprised!

They were just about to tell me about the
meteor themselves!

From what they’re saying, the trajectory of a giant
meteor suddenly changed...
and it’s nearly guaranteed to crash into Pasio!
